titles: Achitophel, or, The picture of a wicked politician Diuided into three parts.
author: Carpenter, Nathanael, 1589-1628?
publisher: Printed [by Humphrey Lownes and R. Young] for M[ichael] S[parke],
notes: Dedication signed: N.C., i.e. Nathanael Carpenter.
A parable on Irish politics of uncertain reference.
A4v is blank. Variant 1: A4v contains verse from 2 Samuel. Variant 2: title page has "Written by N.C. ..".
Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
keywords: Ireland --  Politics and government --  17th century --  Early works to 1800.
